title: Mohawk Bend
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Pizza, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Bar and restaurant housed in a renovated theater space with high ceiling and various seating areas, operating since Aug 2011. Offers mostly vegetarian food with a range of snack foods plus burgers, pizza, flatbreads, salads, and on weekends brunch. Menu is around 30% vegan (80% vegetarian), and there's a separate kitchen and chef for the vegan food. Features California craft beers on tap alongside selection of wine and liquor.
